definitions.definition: Having been accustomed or desensitized to something unpleasant through exposure or experience; inured .

examples: The bloody scene could reduce even the most hardened soldier to tears.

definitions.definition: Firmly established in a behavior seen as bad; unlikely to change one's ways ; inveterate .
Having extra defences against attack; highly fortified.

main_definition: Having been accustomed or desensitized to something unpleasant through exposure or experience; inured .
secondary_definitions: Firmly established in a behavior seen as bad; unlikely to change one's ways ; inveterate .
( computing , military ) Having extra defences against attack; highly fortified.
